attributes.action: Its legal in Scotland for to people to come together in a handfasting ceremony.
attributes.additional_details: Give pagans in England and Wales the same rights. By allowing the law to stay the same the pagan community is being religiously discriminated against and in 2021 a time where equality is important. Issues like this shouldn't need a petition to change the law.
attributes.background: Change the law. Recognise the pagan communities handfastenings in England and Wales.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/329249
